item.description:
Abrahadabra ....an Aramaic-based word that roughly translated means "I create as I speak."

What are you creating? Is it what you want to be creating?

Ann Ide, BostonLOA member & New Possibilities Life Coach, will give you the "HOW TO" guide to speak & use affirmations in a way that is truly believable to you. Otherwise, you will still create what you don't want!

- Uncover a story you might be carrying that's holding you back
- Shift it to free you to "magically" attract & create what you want

Ann will guide you through a meditation into a "vortex of expanding love". From there, you'll experience how your stories naturally change, with ease & grace.

Join us for this beautiful, magical experience!

Note: Please bring a pen and notebook with you so you can get the full experience!

Thank you, Ann, for your gift of love, time & availability for us.

****************************************************************
About Ann Ide:
www.NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com

Ann is a certified master practitioner in Neuro-linguistic Programming (NLP) & Hypnotherapy, & a certified NLP Life Coach with over 15 years experience. She has trained & consulted people nationally. Her passion is helping people move beyond suffering & mere survival, creating “New Possibilities” in their lives for greater harmony, happiness & success. She provides personal & group coaching, guided meditations, & business coaching workshops.

****************************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.
We usually provide handouts & have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your understanding & support!

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Abrahadabra! The Magic of Creating As You Speak
